# Here are some plots 

You can make plots in the same way as always. 

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

df = tibble(
  x = rnorm(100, 2, 5), 
  y = 1 + 2 * x - 0.5 * x^2 + rnorm(100)
)

df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = x , y = y)) + 
  geom_point()
```
